snippet.title: Roots of Yggdrasil - Animated Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Roots of Yggdrasil is a turn-based roguelike city builder set in post-Ragnarok era of Norse mythology.

Wishlist now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2071430/Roots_of_Yggdrasil/

Lead a tribe of Vikings as they build and explore under the growing threat of the Ginnungagap, a dark void that relentlessly pursues them. You have limited time to build in each procedurally-generated level before the Void engulfs everything; Discover a diverse cast of characters as you attempt to escape your fate and mend Yggdrasil, the World Tree.

Twitter Roots of Yggdrasil: https://twitter.com/WeAreYggdrasil
Twitter ManaVoid Studio: https://twitter.com/WeAreManaVoid
Instagram ManaVoid Studio: https://www.instagram.com/wearemanavoid/
Facebook ManaVoid Studio: https://www.facebook.com/WeAreManaVoid/ 

Developed by ManaVoid Entertainment
